name: A Windy Day
description:
Story

London, 2019. Theresa loses her beautiful pink hat on a windy day and her only hope of getting it back on her clothes rack (which for some apparent reason stands right in the middle of the city) is your skill to control the wind!

Controls

WASD or ARROW KEYS - Control the wind direction

Probably also works with a controller, you tell us.

Team (alphabetically)

  • Bachmann Christof
  • Tscheinig Andreas
  • Waysocher Peter
  • Wedenig Christoph

Leave some comments, we would love to hear your feedback! :)
